name: Hotline Score Counter
description:
If unchecked, the Hotline 024 Score Counter is disabled
(This action may improve performance).

name: Nikku Style Menu
description:
If checked, the Hotline 024 additional menu is activated to select a different Nikku's style in the song.
(Unoptimized)

name: Set Nikku's Style:
description: Select a different Nikku's style (if the 'Nikku Select Menu' is unchecked)

name: Hotline Pause Menu
description: if unchecked, the Hotline 024 Pause Menu is disabled.

name: Set Pause Music:
description: Select the song 'Memories' from Hotline 024 (only in 'Hotline Pause Menu') or those in the Psych Client Preferences.

name: New Hotline UI
description: If unchecked, the new Hotline 024 UI is disabled.
